link_type.description: Type of links when linking one dataset to another

values.string: make string dataset containing path to link

include_schema_id.description: Include schema id as attributed in generated file

schema_id_attr.description: Id to use attributes for schema id

flag_custom_nodes.description: Include schema_id: 'custom' in attributes for custom nodes

default_compress_size.description: Compress datasets that have total size larger than this value, or 0 if should not do any compression based on size
